ğŸ PYTHON APPLICATION (13 files)

Core Application
  â†’ punctaj.py (191.86 KB)
    Main application with all UI
    NEW: Auto-refresh after cloud sync
    Authorization and permission checks
    All business logic

Admin Management
  â†’ admin_panel.py
    Admin panel interface
    User and institution management

  â†’ admin_permissions.py (56.51 KB)
    NEW: Granular permission system
    7 permission types implemented
    Permission storage and retrieval

  â†’ admin_ui.py
    Admin UI components
    Form layouts and widgets

  â†’ organization_view.py
    Organization structure visualization
    Hierarchy display

Security & Verification
  â†’ permission_check_helpers.py (NEW)
    Permission verification functions
    Button state management
    Per-institution permission checks

  â†’ permission_decorators.py
    Permission decorators for functions
    Clean permission checking

Cloud & Synchronization
  â†’ discord_auth.py (32.71 KB)
    Discord OAuth2 authentication
    User registration and login
    Token management

  â†’ realtime_sync.py (6.32 KB)
    Cloud data synchronization
    Syncs every 30 seconds
    Runs in background daemon

  â†’ permission_sync_fix.py (5.59 KB)
    Permission synchronization
    Syncs every 5 seconds
    Real-time permission updates

  â†’ supabase_sync.py (19.99 KB)
    Supabase PostgreSQL integration
    REST API client
    Data transfer and sync

Utilities
  â†’ config_resolver.py (5.89 KB)
    Configuration file management
    Settings loading

  â†’ action_logger.py (16.44 KB)
    Audit logging system
    Action tracking and recording


âš™ï¸ CONFIGURATION TEMPLATES (2 files)

  â†’ discord_config.ini
    Discord OAuth2 configuration
    User must add: Client ID, Client Secret
    Template for redirect URI

  â†’ supabase_config.ini
    Supabase cloud backend configuration
    User must add: Project URL, API Key
    Template for database connection


ğŸ“¦ INSTALLATION & SETUP (1 file)

  â†’ INSTALEAZA.bat
    Professional Windows installer
    Features:
      - Python 3.7+ version check
      - Directory creation: %APPDATA%\PunctajManager
      - File copying with progress
      - Start Menu shortcut creation
      - Feature description display
      - Requires: Python 3.7+ (pre-installed)

ğŸ“Š PACKAGE STATISTICS
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Total Files: 20
â”œâ”€â”€ Python Code: 13 files (~400 KB)
â”œâ”€â”€ Configuration: 2 files (< 1 KB)
â”œâ”€â”€ Installation: 1 file
â””â”€â”€ Documentation: 4 files

Total Package Size: ~430 KB (before compression)

Code Statistics:
- Main application: 4922 lines (punctaj.py)
- Permission system: 1175+ lines (admin_permissions.py)
- Helper functions: 200+ lines (permission_check_helpers.py)
- Supporting modules: 300+ lines (various)
- Total: ~6500+ lines of Python code


â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

âœ¨ NEW FEATURES IN v2.5
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

1. GRANULAR PERMISSION SYSTEM
   Files: admin_permissions.py, permission_check_helpers.py
   Features:
   - 7 new permission types
   - Per-institution control
   - Per-user permission settings
   - Automatic button enable/disable
   - Admin panel for configuration

2. AUTO-REFRESH AFTER CLOUD SYNC
   Files: punctaj.py (download_from_cloud function)
   Features:
   - Automatic table reload (500ms)
   - Automatic Discord section refresh (1000ms)
   - Automatic admin button refresh (1500ms)
   - No application restart required

3. REAL-TIME SYNCHRONIZATION
   Files: realtime_sync.py, permission_sync_fix.py
   Features:
   - Cloud sync: Every 30 seconds
   - Permission sync: Every 5 seconds
   - Background daemon threads
   - Automatic conflict resolution

4. DISCORD INTEGRATION
   Files: discord_auth.py
   Features:
   - OAuth2 authentication
   - Automatic user registration
   - Username synchronization
   - Secure token management


â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ”§ HOW TO USE THIS PACKAGE
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

FOR ADMINISTRATORS (Deploying to Users)
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
â”œâ”€ 1. Read: README_DISTRIBUTION.txt
â”œâ”€ 2. Verify all 20 files present
â”œâ”€ 3. Test: Run INSTALEAZA.bat on clean system (optional)
â”œâ”€ 4. Package: Create ZIP/RAR file from dist folder
â”œâ”€ 5. Distribute: Send to users with setup instructions
â”œâ”€ 6. Support: Provide Discord/Supabase credentials separately
â””â”€ 7. Monitor: Track installations and issues

FOR END USERS (Installing Locally)
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
â”œâ”€ 1. Read: CITESTE_INTAI.txt (Installation Guide)
â”œâ”€ 2. Extract: Unzip/unrar dist folder
â”œâ”€ 3. Install: Double-click INSTALEAZA.bat
â”œâ”€ 4. Configure: Edit discord_config.ini with API key
â”œâ”€ 5. Configure: Edit supabase_config.ini with API key
â”œâ”€ 6. Launch: Run from Start Menu or python punctaj.py
â””â”€ 7. Login: Click "Login cu Discord" and authenticate

FOR TROUBLESHOOTING
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
â”œâ”€ 1. Check: VERSIUNE_INFO.txt - Common Issues section
â”œâ”€ 2. Check: CITESTE_INTAI.txt - Troubleshooting section
â”œâ”€ 3. Error: Open Command Prompt and run: python punctaj.py -debug
â”œâ”€ 4. Logs: Check %APPDATA%\PunctajManager\logs\
â””â”€ 5. Contact: Support team with error messages


â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸš€ QUICK START WORKFLOW
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

User's First-Time Setup (5 minutes)
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Step 1: Extract all 20 files from ZIP/RAR
â”‚         Location: Any folder
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Step 2: Double-click INSTALEAZA.bat
â”‚         Wait 30-60 seconds for installation
â”‚         See "Installation Complete" message
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Step 3: Edit discord_config.ini
â”‚         Add: Client ID = [your discord bot client id]
â”‚         Add: Client Secret = [your discord bot secret]
â”‚         Save file
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Step 4: Edit supabase_config.ini
â”‚         Add: url = https://[project].supabase.co
â”‚         Add: api_key = [your anon public key]
â”‚         Save file
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Step 5: Click "Punctaj Manager" in Start Menu
â”‚         OR: Run Command Prompt and type: python punctaj.py
â”‚         Wait 10-15 seconds for app to load
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Step 6: Click "Login cu Discord"
â”‚         Browser opens, complete Discord authentication
â”‚         Account created automatically in Supabase
â”‚
â””â”€ Step 7: Done! Application ready to use
          See all cities, institutions, scores
          Admin can manage permissions


â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

âš™ï¸ SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Minimum
  - Windows 7 or newer
  - Python 3.7 or newer (REQUIRED - must be installed)
  - 512 MB RAM
  - 200 MB disk space
  - Internet connection (for Discord & Supabase)
  - Modern web browser

Recommended
  - Windows 10 or newer
  - Python 3.9+
  - 1 GB RAM
  - Stable internet connection
  - SSD (for faster application startup)


â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ“‹ INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS (TL;DR)
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

For Users:
  1. Extract dist folder
  2. Double-click INSTALEAZA.bat
  3. Wait for "Installation Complete"
  4. Configure config files with API keys
  5. Run application from Start Menu

For Admins:
  1. Verify all 20 files present
  2. Package dist folder as ZIP
  3. Send to users
  4. Provide Discord/Supabase credentials separately
  5. Answer user setup questions

ğŸ¯ WHAT USERS WILL GET
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

After running INSTALEAZA.bat, users will have:

Location: %APPDATA%\PunctajManager\
Files: All 13 Python files + 2 config files + documentation

Shortcuts: "Punctaj Manager" in Windows Start Menu

Features:
  - Discord login with automatic account creation
  - Real-time cloud synchronization (30-sec intervals)
  - Real-time permission updates (5-sec intervals)
  - Granular permission controls per institution
  - Auto-refresh after cloud download (no restart needed)
  - Complete audit logging
  - Professional admin panel

ğŸ“ SUPPORT & HELP
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

  â†’ Check: INSTALEAZA.bat for Python requirement

  â†’ Read: VERSIUNE_INFO.txt - Troubleshooting section
  â†’ Check: %APPDATA%\PunctajManager\logs\ for error logs
  â†’ Run: Command Prompt with python punctaj.py -debug

  â†’ Read: README_DISTRIBUTION.txt
  â†’ Follow: Deployment checklist
  â†’ Track: User installations

  â†’ Edit: discord_config.ini (Discord OAuth2 setup)
  â†’ Edit: supabase_config.ini (Supabase database setup)
  â†’ Ensure: Both files configured before first launch


â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ‰ SUMMARY
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

âœ… Distribution package is COMPLETE and READY
âœ… All 20 files verified present
âœ… Latest code deployed with all features
âœ… Professional installer script included
âœ… Complete documentation in Romanian
âœ… System is production-ready

The dist folder at D:\punctaj\setup_output\dist\ contains everything
needed for end-user distribution and installation.

Users can extract, run the installer, configure API credentials,
and have a fully functional Punctaj Manager v2.5 application with:
  - Granular permission system
  - Auto-refresh after cloud sync
  - Real-time synchronization
  - Discord OAuth2 authentication


â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

                        ğŸš€ READY TO DISTRIBUTE ğŸš€

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
